div.l: Swyved þe Millewardys doughter vp right
While þou hast as a cowarde byn a gast
Ye fals harlot qduod þe Miller hast
A fals traytour fals clerke qduod he
Þou shalt be ded by goddys dignite
Who durst be so bolde to de disꝑparage
My doughter þat is come of such a lynage
And by þe þrote bol he caught Aleyn̄
And he hent him dispituosly a gayn̄
And on þe nose he smote him with his fist
Down̄ ron þe blood streem by his brest
And in þe floor͗e with nose and mouth to broke
Þey wallewe as don twey pigges in a Cote
And vp þey gon and down a gayn anon̄
Til þe Milleward sporned at a ston̄
And down̄ he fylle bakward vpon his wife
Þat wist no þyng of þis nyse stryfe
For sho was falle a slepe alitel wight
With Iohn þe clerk þat waked hed al nyght
And with þe falle oute of hir slepe she bryde
Helpe holy cros of Bromholme she seide
In manus tuas lord to þe y call
A wake symkyn þe fynde is on me falle
Myn hert is broken helpe y am but dede
Þer lith vpon my wombe and vpon myn hede
Help symkyn for þe fals clerkys fyȝt
Þis Iohn stirte vp as fast as ever he myȝt
And graspeth by þe walles to and fro
To fynde a staf and she stert vp also
And knewe þe estres bet þan did he Iohn
And by þe wal she founde a staf anon̄
And saugh a litil chymeryng of a lyȝt
For at an hole In shon̄ þe mone bryȝt
And by þat lyȝt sho saugh hem boþ two
But sikerly she nost who was who
But as she saugh a white þing in hir ye
And whan sho gan þis white þing espye
She wende þis clerke hed wered a voluper
And with þe staf sho drough ay ner and ner
And wend han hit þis Aleyn̄ atte fulle
